name: LIBERTY UNIVERSITY
sampleDescriptions: Liberty University had its flight program suspended. Assisted in connecting Liberty Staff to the House Committee on Veterans Affairs Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity to discuss reinstatement of pr
Liberty University had its Veterans Affairs approved flight program suspended. Arranged meetings with appropriate House Committee on Veterans Affairs staff to make them aware. Connected Liberty staff
